title: Remove Feature from Plan
description: A customer wants to remove the 'Premium Voicemail' feature from their plan to save money.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and verify they have the 'Premium Voicemail' add-on.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the feature is active on the customer's account.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the monthly savings and confirm they wish to proceed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly states the new, lower monthly cost.

tasks.description: Remove the add-on from the customer's plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully removes the feature using the system tool.
